title: SEAFORT ORB / fairweather t500 helmet
description: Orb that checks how much armour you've collected after you pick up the helmet.

dialogueTree.title: Endurance: "Brother, you've managed to collect..."
dialogueTree.english: Brother, you've managed to collect all the armour pieces. Too bad it's too late for the big showdown.
dialogueTree.polish: Bracie, udało ci się zebrać wszystkie elementy pancerza. Szkoda, że już za późno na wielkie starcie.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Брацце, табе ўдалося сабраць усе элементы брані. Шкада, што ўжо занадта позна для вялікага сутыкнення.

links.title: You: "Don't think this helmet would have..."
links.english: Don't think this helmet would have helped me anyway. (Look down at your wound.)
links.polish: Nie sądzę, żeby ten hełm mi w czymkolwiek pomógł. (Spójrz na swoją ranę).
links.belarusian: Не думаю, што гэты шлем мне ў чым-небудзь дапаможа. (Паглядзі на сваю рану).

Alternate1.english: Don't think this helmet would have helped me anyway. (Look down at your wounds.)
Alternate1.polish: Nie sądzę, żeby ten hełm mi w czymkolwiek pomógł. (Spójrz na swoje rany).
Alternate1.belarusian: Я не думаю, што гэты шлем мне чымсьці дапаможа. (Паглядзі на свае раны).

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It would have looked very impressiv..."
links.english: It would have looked very impressive... Still. You found it all. Now your mortal coil is  *completely* protected. Few cops are this futuristic.
links.polish: Wyglądałoby to imponująco... No, ale masz całość. Teraz twoje doczesne ciało jest *całkowicie* chronione. Niewielu policjantów jest tak futurystycznych.
links.belarusian: Гэта выглядала б ўражваюча... Ну, але ў цябе цяпер усё. Цяпер тваё зямное цела *цалкам* абаронена. Нямногія паліцыянты настолькі футурыстычныя.

links.title: You: "At least now I am truly invincible...."
links.english: At least now I am truly invincible. [Leave.]
links.polish: Teraz przynajmniej jestem naprawdę nietykalny. [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: Зараз прынамсі я сапраўды недатыкальны. [Адыдзі].

links.title: You: "At least my collector's impulse has..."
links.english: At least my collector's impulse has been satisfied.
links.polish: Zaspokoiłem przynajmniej swój zmysł kolekcjonera.
links.belarusian: Я задаволіў хаця б свой густ калекцыянера.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Indeed. You found it all. Now your..."
links.english: Indeed. You found it all. Now your mortal coil is  *completely* protected. Few cops are this futuristic.
links.polish: To prawda. Znalazłeś całość. Teraz twoje doczesne ciało jest *całkowicie* chronione. Niewielu policjantów jest tak futurystycznych.
links.belarusian: Гэта праўда. Ты знайшоў усё. Цяпер тваё зямное цела *цалкам* абаронена. Нямногія паліцэйскія настолькі футурыстычныя.

links.title: You: "I'm sure I'll have a use for this a..."
links.english: I'm sure I'll have a use for this armour in the future.
links.polish: Na pewno będę miał w przyszłości pożytek z tego pancerza.
links.belarusian: Напэўна, у будучыні я атрымаю карысць ад гэтай брані.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Future use for a future armour. Agr..."
links.english: Future use for a future armour. Agreed. Gear up, heavy porcelain man. It's a violent world.
links.polish: Przyszłe wykorzystanie pancerza przyszłości. Zgoda. Zbrój się, porcelanowy człowieku. Żyjesz w brutalnym świecie.
links.belarusian: Будучае выкарыстанне брані будучыні. Згода. Браняйся, парцалянавы чалавек. Ты жывеш у жорсткім свеце.

dialogueTree.title: Physical Instrument: "Son, you found another piece of the..."
dialogueTree.english: Son, you found another piece of the armour puzzle. Too bad it's too late for the big showdown. And also too late to collect all of them and have a full set.
dialogueTree.polish: Synu, znalazłeś kolejny element pancernej układanki. Szkoda, że już za późno na wielkie starcie. I na to, żeby zebrać je wszystkie i mieć pełny zestaw.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Сыне, ты знайшоў яшчэ адзін элемент браневай галаваломкі. Шкада, што ўжо занадта позна для вялікай сутычкі. І для таго, каб сабраць іх усе і мець поўны набор.

links.title: You: "Don't think this helmet would have..."
links.english: Don't think this helmet would have helped me anyway. (Look down at your wound.)
links.polish: Nie sądzę, żeby ten hełm mi w czymkolwiek pomógł. (Spójrz na swoją ranę).
links.belarusian: Я не думаю, што гэты шлем мне чымсьці дапаможа. (Паглядзі на сваю рану).

Alternate1.english: Don't think this helmet would have helped me anyway. (Look down at your wounds.)
Alternate1.polish: Nie sądzę, żeby ten hełm mi w czymkolwiek pomógł. (Spójrz na swoje rany).
Alternate1.belarusian: Не думаю, што гэты шлем мне чымсьці дапаможа. (Паглядзі на свае раны).

links.title: Physical Instrument: "But it would have looked really imp..."
links.english: But it would have looked really impressive.
links.polish: Ale wyglądałoby to naprawdę imponująco.
links.belarusian: Але выглядала б гэта сапраўды ўражліва.

links.title: You: "And maybe scared the enemy combatan..."
links.english: And maybe scared the enemy combatants...
links.polish: I może wystraszyłoby przeciwników...
links.belarusian: І можа напалохала б праціўнікаў...

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Exactly. But no use crying over spi..."
links.english: Exactly. But no use crying over spilt milk. Keep up the pace. Only forward.
links.polish: Dokładnie. Ale nie ma co płakać nad rozlanym mlekiem. Naprzód marsz. Nigdy w tył.
links.belarusian: Дакладна. Але няма сэнсу плакаць над пралітым малаком. Уперад марш. Ні калі назад.

links.title: You: "Can't do anything about it now."
links.english: Can't do anything about it now.
links.polish: Nic na to teraz nie poradzimy.
links.belarusian: Зараз мы з гэтым нічога не зробім.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "That's a good attitude to take. I l..."
links.english: That's a good attitude to take. I like it. Keep it up, and keep the helmet handy.
links.polish: To dobre podejście. Podoba mi się. Nie zmieniaj go. I miej ten hełm pod ręką.
links.belarusian: Гэта добры падыход. Мне падабаецца. Не змяняй яго. І трымай гэты шлем пад рукой.

links.title: You: "I never cared about collecting the..."
links.english: I never cared about collecting the full set. I'm not the collector type.
links.polish: Nie zależało mi, żeby zebrać pełny zestaw. Nie jestem jakimś kolekcjonerem.
links.belarusian: Мне не было важна, каб сабраць поўны набор. Я не нейкі калекцыянер.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Yeah, sure, but you would have beco..."
links.english: Yeah, sure, but you would have become nearly invincible.
links.polish: Tak. Pewnie. Ale byłbyś niemalże nietykalny.
links.belarusian: Так. Вядома. Але ты быў бы амаль недатыкальны.

links.title: You: "I'll make do. [Leave.]"
links.english: I'll make do. [Leave.]
links.polish: Jakoś sobie poradzę. [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: Як-небудзь упраўлюся. [Сыдзі].

links.title: You: "Damn. Perhaps another day. [Leave.]"
links.english: Damn. Perhaps another day. [Leave.]
links.polish: Cholera. Może innym razem. [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: Халера. Можа іншым разам. [Адыдзі].

links.title: You: "Hey, at least I've got this cool he..."
links.english: Hey, at least I've got this cool helmet *now*. I can wear it into the next battle.
links.polish: Hej, przynajmniej *teraz* mam ten czadowy hełm. Mogę go założyć do następnej bitwy.
links.belarusian: Гэй, прынамсі *цяпер* у мяне ёсць гэты дзівосны шлем. Я магу надзець яго на наступную бітву.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "I'm liking the positive attitude. K..."
links.english: I'm liking the positive attitude. Keep it up, champ.
links.polish: Podoba mi się takie pozytywne myślenie. Tylko tak dalej, mistrzuniu.
links.belarusian: Мне падабаецца такое пазітыўнае мысленне. Так трымаць, майстар.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.english: [Leave.]
links.polish: [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: [Адыдзі].
